name: Vitale #7
description: Your 3.02 carat cut-cornered rectangular modified brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS2 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a rare white F colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. The cut of your diamond is a variant of the “princess cut” and is characterised by a brilliant-cut faceting style, creating exceptional sparkle and fire. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
